import React from "react"; import { useState, useEffect } from "react"; const Specialization = () => { const [diseases, setDiseases] = useState([]); useEffect(() => { fetch("/contents/diseases") .then((response) => response.json()) .then((diseases) => { setDiseases(diseases); }); }, [diseases]); return (

))}

); }; export default Specialization;
